stateDiagram-v2
    %% L++ State Diagram: Documentation Generator
    [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] --> idle
    idle --> idle : START
    idle --> discovering : GENERATE
    discovering --> generating_graphs : DONE [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) or op... && error is None]
    discovering --> generating_mermaid : DONE [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) or o... && error is None]
    discovering --> error : DONE [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    generating_graphs --> generating_logic : DONE [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) or opt... && error is None]
    generating_graphs --> generating_mermaid : DONE [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController) or o... && error is None]
    generating_logic --> generating_functions : DONE [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) or... && error is None]
    generating_logic --> generating_mermaid : DONE [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) or o... && error is None]
    generating_functions --> generating_mermaid : DONE [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController) or o... && error is None]
    generating_mermaid --> updating_readmes : DONE [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) or op... && error is None]
    generating_mermaid --> generating_report : DONE [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) or op... && error is None]
    updating_readmes --> generating_report : DONE [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) or op... && error is None]
    updating_readmes --> generating_dashboard : DONE [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) or... && error is None]
    generating_report --> generating_dashboard : DONE [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController) or... && error is None]
    generating_report --> complete : DONE [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    generating_dashboard --> complete : DONE [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    idle --> error : ERROR [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    discovering --> error : ERROR [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    generating_graphs --> error : ERROR [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    generating_mermaid --> error : ERROR [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    generating_logic --> error : ERROR [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    generating_report --> error : ERROR [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    updating_readmes --> error : ERROR [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    generating_functions --> error : ERROR [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    complete --> error : ERROR [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    generating_dashboard --> error : ERROR [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    error --> idle : RESET
    complete --> idle : RESET
    complete --> [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    error --> [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
